items.value: (%@king%) of (%@kingdom%) starts a campaign to defend (%@city%).
(%@general%) joins the campaign and moves towards the city.
On (*_his/her_-0-*) way to the city, (%@general%) meets an enemy army and survives with (%hp%) HP.
On (*_his/her_-0-*) way to the city, (%@general%) meets an enemy army and died.
(%@general%) arrives at the city. (*_He/She_-0-*) will stay at the city for (%expiration%) days.
Everyone is at the city. They will stay at the city for (%expiration%) days.
Enemy army from (%@kingdom%) attacks the city. City defense wins the battle with (%hp%) HP remaining. (%@general%) perishes during the battle.
Enemy army from (%@kingdom%) attacks the city. City was defeated by (%@general%).
